name: part_012
file: tmp_【3D Showcase】 Anak Alien holoID Turun ke Bumi (？) #AiraniIofifteen3D【Airani Iofifteen ⧸ hololive ID】 [YHMGdX1kC00]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Iofi talks to the audience, expressing her gratitude and reflecting on her journey over the past three years.
Iofi performs her song 'Q&A=E' for the audience.

subtitles.original: （笑い・ため息）
subtitles.english: (Laughing and sighing)

subtitles.original: はぁ… 会えたね！
subtitles.english: Hah... We finally met!

subtitles.original: あだっ… 大丈夫？ オッケー、私大丈夫。
subtitles.english: Ouch... Are you okay? Okay, I'm okay.

subtitles.original: あ、これ取っておきました。これ要る。
subtitles.english: Ah, I kept this. I need this.

subtitles.original: Minal Aidin wal-Faizin! はい… はい！
subtitles.english: Happy Eid Mubarak! Yes... Yes!

subtitles.original: ということで… はぁ… 全部やっておきました。
subtitles.english: So... hah... I've done everything.

subtitles.original: Yopi udah lakuin apa yang Yopi pengen. Dah deh aman.
subtitles.english: Yopi has done everything she wanted. It's safe now.

subtitles.original: あぁ、何でこのBGMなの… 泣いちゃう…
subtitles.english: Oh man, why is this the BGM? It's so emotional...

subtitles.original: So I want to just really really say thank you, thank you, thank you all for supporting me...
subtitles.english: So I want to just really really say thank you, thank you, thank you all for supporting me...

subtitles.original: ...for two... almost three years, right? It's almost three years.
subtitles.english: ...for two... almost three years, right? It's almost three years.

subtitles.original: Thank you makasih udah men-support, udah meng-oshi, udah apa sih mendorong Yopi selama tiga tahun...
subtitles.english: Thank you for supporting me, for being my fan, for pushing Yopi forward for these three years...

subtitles.original: …hampir tiga tahun ya, tiga tahun ini ya. Makasih.
subtitles.english: ...almost three years, right? These three years. Thank you.

subtitles.original: ということで本当に… えっとマネージャーさんも。
subtitles.english: So, really... um, my manager as well.

subtitles.original: マネージャー泣いてる？ 今泣いてる？ え、Mちゃん泣いてるって？
subtitles.english: Manager, are you crying? Crying right now? Eh, is M-chan crying?

subtitles.original: マネージャーありがとう。
subtitles.english: Manager, thank you.

subtitles.original: あの本当に皆さんホロライブの全体皆さんありがとう。本当に仲良くしてくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Really, thank you to everyone at Hololive. Thank you so much for being so friendly.

subtitles.original: ホロスターズのみんなもありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: And to everyone at Holostars, thank you very much.

subtitles.original: えっとマネージャーちゃんとみつみママ、えっとlackパパ、Viviママ...
subtitles.english: Manager-chan, Mitsumi-mama, lack-papa, Vivi-mama...

subtitles.original: …とあのYAGOO、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: ...and YAGOO, thank you!

subtitles.original: Yopiをホロライブインドネシア一期生として受け入れてくれてありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thank you for accepting Yopi as a Hololive Indonesia 1st Gen member.

subtitles.original: あのYAGOO大好きだよ。うん、何回言ってもだけど、大好きだよ。Makasih Bang.
subtitles.english: YAGOO, I love you. No matter how many times I say it, I love you. Thank you, sir.

subtitles.original: Okay, jadi habis ini kita sayang sekali lagu terakhir...
subtitles.english: Okay, so after this, unfortunately, it's the final song...

subtitles.original: Jadi udah siap? Ini bakal jadi call-and-response terakhir. Okay?
subtitles.english: Are you ready? This will be the last call-and-response. Okay?

subtitles.original: 本当に今日ありがとう。じゃあ…
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for today. Well...

subtitles.original: 最後の曲行きたいと思います。
subtitles.english: I'd like to move on to the final song.

subtitles.original: 聴いてください。Q&A=E!
subtitles.english: Please listen: Q&A=E!

subtitles.original: 予想外 question
subtitles.english: Unexpected question

subtitles.original: 想定外 answer
subtitles.english: Unpredictable answer

subtitles.original: せーの！ Clap your hands!
subtitles.english: Ready! Clap your hands!

subtitles.original: 恋しちゃうかも
subtitles.english: I might fall in love

subtitles.original: 暗作な世界に
subtitles.english: In this pitch-black world

subtitles.original: 好きっていいでしょう？
subtitles.english: It's okay to say I love you, right?

subtitles.original: 私色に染まる
subtitles.english: Stained in my own colors

subtitles.original: ちょいちょいちょいでしょう？
subtitles.english: Easy as pie, right?

subtitles.original: イタズラな princess
subtitles.english: Mischievous princess

subtitles.original: 本気だっちゃおうもん！
subtitles.english: I'm getting serious!

subtitles.original: おんなじ想いかな？
subtitles.english: Do you feel the same way?

subtitles.original: もっと近くにいたいの
subtitles.english: I want to be closer to you

subtitles.original: でも待っているだけなんて ヨヨヨつまらない
subtitles.english: But just waiting around is so, so, so boring

subtitles.original: 変わらない宝物
subtitles.english: An unchanging treasure

subtitles.original: 宇宙で一番...
subtitles.english: The best in the universe...

subtitles.original: 思っちゃうよね どっちゃうよね 恋しちゃえば
subtitles.english: You'll think so, you'll be puzzled, if you fall in love

subtitles.original: 私らしさ
subtitles.english: Being myself

subtitles.original: ふねえみちゃうような まじちゃうなら 試しちゃおう
subtitles.english: Getting lost, if we're serious, let's give it a try

subtitles.original: 未来 未来
subtitles.english: Future, future

subtitles.original: まだまだ持っちゃうのに 踊っちゃうのに 笑ってほしい
subtitles.english: I'm still holding on, still dancing, but I want you to smile

subtitles.original: それ君だから
subtitles.english: Because it's you

subtitles.original: わかっちゃうよね あっちゃうよね 決めしちゃおう
subtitles.english: You'll understand, we'll meet, let's decide it

subtitles.original: Question? Answer!
subtitles.english: Question? Answer!

subtitles.original: 大好きだもん
subtitles.english: Because I love you

subtitles.original: そんなんドドって言うよ
subtitles.english: I'll say it loud and clear

subtitles.original: もう頷んでいいかな？
subtitles.english: Is it okay to nod now?

subtitles.original: 見ていてほしいの
subtitles.english: I want you to watch me
